alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 4:08PM MDT until May 30 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota, including the following counties, in west central Minnesota, Big Stone. In northeast South Dakota, Codington, Grant and Roberts. * WHEN...Until 200 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At approximately 415 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported water over SD Highway 123 near Wilmot. Additional flooding is occurring across portions of Codington, Grant, Roberts, and Big Stone counties. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Milbank, Wilmot, Rauville, Beardsley, South Shore, Waverly, Corona, Stockholm, Strandburg, Twin Brooks, La Bolt, Troy, Marvin, Barry, Bonanza Grove, Big Stone Lake, Yankeetown, Lismore Colony, Dakota Sioux Casino and southern Lake Traverse Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
